objects.text: IPX7 WATERPROOF • 30+ HOURS PLAYTIME • DEEP BASS SOUND

product_details.name: kurdene Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth 5.3 in Ear Buds Light Weight Headphones,Deep Bass Sound,Built in Mics Headset,Clear Calls Earphones for Sports Workout
product_details.description: Noise Control: Sound Isolation. Sensitivity: 40 dB. Headphones Jack: No Jack. Model Name: V9I. Connectivity Technology: Wireless. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth. Age Range (Description): ALL. Compatible Devices: iOS and Android. Cable Feature: Without Cable. Item Weight: 0.134 ounces. Water Resistance Level: Water Resistant. Unit Count: 2.0 Count. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 1. Controller Type: Touch Control. Battery Life: 4.5 Hours. Audio Driver Type: Dynamic Driver. Bluetooth Range: 10 Meters. Bluetooth Version: 5.3. Carrying Case Battery Average Life: 30 Hours. Carrying Case Material: plastic. Audio Driver Size: 10 Millimeters. Earpiece Shape: In Ear. Series Number: 8. Number of USB 2 Ports: 1. Carrying Case Battery Charging Time: 1 Hours. Is Autographed: No. Product Dimensions: 2.36 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek rectangular layout with a modern and tech-savvy aesthetic, designed to promote a pair of wireless earbuds. At the top, the main headline (id: "heading") is displayed in large bold white text, followed by a subheading (id: "subheading") directly underneath in a sleek techno-style blue. The central area features an image of the product (id: "product_image"), placed prominently to attract visual focus. A feature summary (id: "description") is situated below the product image in smaller white font, highlighting key benefits. The price (id: "price") is bold and eye-catching in large blue text, followed by a call-to-action rectangular button (id: "cta_button") containing white text (id: "cta_text") urging immediate purchase. The background uses a gradient from deep navy to dark blue, intersected by subtle shapes, lines, and circular accents adding visual depth and modern design elements.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A1A2E
- Dark Blue: #16213E
- Bright Blue: #1E90FF
- Deep Royal Blue: #0F52BA
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern aesthetic, dominated by matte and metallic black tones that emphasize elegance and sophistication. The earbuds and charging case blend shades of charcoal (#2F2F2F), jet black (#000000), and graphite gray (#4B4B4B), creating a visually cohesive design. Highlights are added with subtle reflections and gradients, giving the black surfaces a smooth, premium look. A small yet vivid blue LED indicator (#1E90FF) adds a pop of contrast, drawing attention to the product’s functionality. Silver accent text (#D3D3D3) for the L and R markings subtly enhances clarity without overpowering. The palette exudes minimalism and tech-savvy appeal.
